properties.description: This rule creates an incident when more than certain number of Dnsniff events are generated from a host
properties.name: Forescout-DNS_Sniff_Event_Monitor
properties.query: ForescoutHostProperties_CL | extend  d = parse_json(HostProperties) | where d.DnsniffEvent matches regex "DNS Query Type:.A;DNS Query/Response:.Query" | extend ipaddress = iif(isnotempty(Ipv4Addr), Ipv4Addr, (iif(isnotempty(Ipv6Addr), Ipv6Addr, ""))) | where isnotempty(ipaddress) and isnotempty(EmIpAddr) | summarize NumEvents_d =count() by ipaddress, EmIpAddr | where NumEvents_d > 2 | sort by NumEvents_d asc | project NumEvents_d, ipaddress, EmIpAddr
